title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 05, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 05, 2020
description:
On today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, Dan recaps Week 4 action in the NFL and Jimmy Butler's performance last night in Game 3 of the NBA Finals. What do the Heat need to do to tie up the series? Is the NFL in trouble with their recent spike in Covid cases? We're joined by NBC's Peter King, ESPN Patriot reporter Mike Reiss, Marlins Manager Don Mattingly and NBA Hall of Famer Reggie Miller.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
